channel.title: Flaming dough... or whatever
channel.description:
DISCLAIMER: I am not responible for anything that this tutorial results in!
Ok this is interesting... you can tell i was really board when i figured this one out.....
Basicly It's Really flammable dough lol
Step 1: mix dough and high proof rubbing alcohol until the consistancy of bread dough [optional]: add food coloring xD Step 2: shape into whatever you want Step 3: light on fire
Pretty worthless but can be fun....
Just for fun post pictures of your flaming dough objects xD
